name: Park Tavern: The Piedmont Room & Piedmont Garden Tent

description: The Atlanta Botanical Garden is a versatile indoor/outdoor wedding venue in Atlanta, GA. An urban oasis nestled in the heart of Midtown, this property offers lush lawns, verdant tropical foliage, and View Vendor Storefront.

name: Ambient + Studio
description: Ambient + Studio in Atlanta, GA, is a unique wedding venue built in 1910. That’s more than 100 years ago. Before the Titanic. Before World War I.
